QuestData.Title: Chasing the Flame
QuestData.Description:
"He awaits you in the darkness"?
<Emberthal's eyes narrow.>
I know where Sarkareth is.
I'll need your help holding him to account. If you want, you could stay here a while and pick through these ruins, but I think we have more pressing needs at hand. If you're willing to see this through to the end, then I need you to follow me.
I'm going to Dragonskull Island.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Scalecommander Emberthal on Dragonskull Island.
